titleStmt.title: Die Klassengegensätze im Zeitalter der Französischen Revolution (5. Die Empörung der Privilegierten)
titleStmt.author: Karl Kautsky

revisionDesc.change: Paragraphs from original estimated and marked up.
Implicit spelling normalization of manually chosen key terms with manually crafted rules.
Seperated sentences using s and tokenized using w using spaCy.
POS-Tags added to pos of w using spaCy.
Lemma added to lemma of w using spaCy.
Stop word inidcator added to type of w using spaCy.
